DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize chronic kidney disease patient suffer vitamin D deficiency benefit give Vitamin D2 coronary artery calcification hyperparathyroidism improve .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Vitamin D Supplementation Coronary Calcification Parathyroid Hormone CKD Patients
DOC.detailed_description: We call 350 CKD patient ( 250 CKD3-5stage 100 CKD5D stage ) suffer vitamin D deficiency.They divide 2 group . One group give vitamin D . They take coronary artery CT test every year ( 2 year ) .We compare coronary calcification progression 2 group .
DOC.criteria: chronic kidney disease patient ( 35D ) serum 25（OH）D < 40nmol/L ( 16ng/ml ) ，serum calcium < 2.55mmol/L（10.2mg/dL）； willing sign could obey follow design allergy vitamin D heart failure ( NYHA 2 grade ) pregnant malignant tumor critical hepatic disease take Vitamin D analogue 3 recent month take clinical trial
